name: SheepShift (2011)
description:
Sheep Shift is a funny puzzle game.

The aim of the game is to move up level by level swapping sheep and thereby dissolving groups of at least four sheep of the same colour.
But be careful – from time to time a wolf might appear on the board whom you should dissolve within given steps! Else it will take off its sheep’s clothing and catch all your sheep!

Main features of Sheep Shift are:
★ 25 Levels in Action Mode on iPad, iPhone, iPod touch
★ 100 Levels in Classic Mode on iPad, iPhone, iPod touch
★ 8 different game colors
★ Funny sheep and wolf animations
★ Funny sheep sounds
★ Game Center support for leaderboard
★ Local statistics
